definitions.definition: A secret language or conventional slang peculiar to thieves, tramps and vagabonds.
The specialized informal vocabulary and terminology used between people with special skill in a field , such as between doctors, mathematicians or hackers .
examples: The conversation was in the argot of the trade, full of acronyms and abbreviations that made no sense to the uninitiate.

definitions.definition: A strongly marked style of speaking.

main_definition: A secret language or conventional slang peculiar to thieves, tramps and vagabonds.
secondary_definitions: The specialized informal vocabulary and terminology used between people with special skill in a field , such as between doctors, mathematicians or hackers .
A strongly marked style of speaking.
